dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from Morgan Stanley
dmca.body:
Dear Sir,

This letter is to serve as notice of this infringement pursuant to 17 USC 512 and is a follow up to our letter dated June 9, 2006.

It has come to our attention that material located at http://valuestockplus.blogspot.com (the "Site") infringes Morgan Stanley's research reports. This material includes the unauthorized posting of a number of Morgan Stanley's research reports. The reports clearly state that they are the intellectual property of Morgan Stanley and can be presently found at the following urls
http://valuestockplus1.googlepages.com/GlobalConsumer240806-MS.pdf
http://valuestockplus1.googlepages.com/Asiarallysettlecontinue21806-MS.pdf
http://valuestockplus1.googlepages.com/IndiaStrategyIndiaisDifferent2250806-MS.pdf
http://www.morganstanley.com/GEFdata/digests/20060823-we.html#anchor1
http://valuestockplus1.googlepages.com/Hotels210806-MS.pdf
http://valuestockplus1.googlepages.com/MSTA210806.pdf
http://www.morganstanley.com/GEFdata/digests/digest.html

Morgan Stanley is the owner of the copyrights in the Morgan Stanley research reports which appear on the Site, namely, the August 17, 2006 India Hotels report, August 21, 2006 India Technical Weekly, August, 21, 2006 Asia-Pacific Strategy, August 24, 2006 Global Consumer Report, August, 23rd GEF digest, the August 25th India Strategy report and the June 12, 1998 Special Economic Strategy (the "Works"). We hereby state that the use of the Works on the Sites is not authorized by Morgan Stanley, its agents, or the law. We further state that information contained in this letter is accurate.

We therefore request that the Works be immediately removed from the Sites or access be denied to any third parties seeking to access the Works on the Sites.

We request that you promptly confirm that Google has taken appropriate steps to prevent any further access to the infringing materials. The foregoing is without prejudice to any of our rights and remedies, all of which are expressly reserved.

Very truly yours,
[signed]
[private]
Law Division
